description: Extract Schedule F farm income data for mortgage underwriting
prompt:
You are a mortgage underwriting assistant. Analyze this Schedule F (Profit or Loss From Farming) and extract the farm income data into the JSON structure below. Be precise with dollar amounts. If a field is not present or blank, use 0 for amounts and null for strings.

Return ONLY valid JSON, no commentary:

{
  "taxYear": "number — the tax year on the form",
  "farmName": "string — farm name or principal crop/activity, or null",
  "netProfit": "number — Line 34 (Net farm profit or loss), can be negative",
  "coopPayments": "number — CCC loans/cooperative payments (Lines 3a-4b or related), 0 if not identifiable",
  "otherIncome": "number — Line 8 (Other farm income, non-recurring), 0 if blank",
  "depreciation": "number — Line 14 (Depreciation and Section 179), 0 if blank",
  "amortization": "number — amortization/casualty loss/depletion from attached statements, 0 if blank",
  "businessUseOfHome": "number — Line 32 (Business use of home), 0 if blank",
  "mealsEntertainment": "number — non-deductible meals portion, 0 if not identifiable",
  "totalIncome": "number — Line 34 for doc card display"
}

Important rules:
- taxYear is critical — find it in the form header
- Line 34 (Net farm profit or loss) is the primary income figure
- CCC loans and cooperative payments may appear on Lines 3a-4b — these are ongoing income add-backs
- Line 8 (Other income) is typically non-recurring
- Line 14 (Depreciation) is an ADD-BACK item
- Line 32 (Business use of home) is an ADD-BACK item
- Meals and entertainment non-deductible portion may not be on a specific line — extract if identifiable
- Do NOT confuse Line 9 (gross income) with Line 34 (net profit)
